items.question: What documents are needed for a loan application?
items.answer: For a loan application, you will need: ID document, proof of address, recent pay slips (3 months), and recent bank statements. The exact list may vary depending on the loan type.

items.question: What is the processing time for an application?
items.answer: We process most applications within 24 to 48 hours. Once approved, funds are typically transferred within 3 to 5 business days.

items.question: Are there any application fees?
items.answer: No, Popular Financia charges no application fees. Our compensation is included in the interest rate, ensuring complete transparency.

items.question: Can I repay my loan early?
items.answer: Yes, you can repay your loan early without any fees or penalties. Simply contact our customer service to arrange the repayment.

items.question: What is the difference between a personal loan and a specific-purpose loan?
items.answer: A personal loan is for free use, while a specific-purpose loan is tied to a specific purchase (car, home improvements...). Personal loans offer more flexibility.

items.question: Is my interest rate fixed for the entire loan duration?
items.answer: Yes, all our loans offer guaranteed fixed rates for the entire contract duration. Your monthly payments remain the same from the first to the last repayment.
